affirmation: I am enough.
I am loved.
I am worthy of great things.
I am more than my mistakes and shortcomings.
As long as I am alive, there is hope for me yet.
When I fail, I am not a failure. Simply a work in progress.
If I fall, I can get back up.
I do not need anyone to complete me.
My friends and/or family love me.
If at first I don't succeed, I will try again.
The world is a brighter place with me in it.
Even if someone doesn't like me, I love myself.
I trust my instinct.
There are more important things than being liked.
I am full of love.
I have love to give.
I love myself.
I am worthy of good things in life.
I am the hero of my own story.
I will apologize when I've done wrong.
I will try new things.
My fears do not control me.
As long as I have my health, I will be alright.
I will ask for help if I need it.
I will let go of the things, places, or people that no longer enrich my life.
There is beauty to be found in the ugliness.
I belong here.
I matter.
I am priceless.
I will leave a legacy.
I am capable of great things.
I do not give up when things get hard.
I am alive, therefore I have hope.
I will go on many adventures in life.
I deserve rest.
I will defend myself from those who harm me.
I am a capable individual.
I can accomplish many things.
I am intelligent.
I am beautiful.
I live in the present, and look forward to the future.
I embrace new challenges.
I do not know everything, but I know enough.
I can only doing what I can, and what I can do is my best.
I will own my shortcomings, and try my best to overcome them.
I am ambitious, and can do anything I put my mind to.
I always try to do the right things, and sometimes get it wrong, but that is ok.
It's ok to make mistakes.
I will fill my cup, before I fill others.
I am the architect of my life. I build its foundation and choose its contents.
My body is healthy; my mind is brilliant; my soul is tranquil.
I will create the same space for my positive thoughts, as I do my negative thoughts.
I have many talents, and I will use them to create positivity in the world.
I forgive those who have hurt me in the past.
I will heal from my wounds.
I will be very successful.
My potential is limitless.
I am courageous.
I am a powerhouse.
Even if it's bad right now, it will be good in the future, just as it has been good in the past.
I radiate beauty, charm, and grace..
My fears do not own me today or tomorrow.
I am at peace.
I am strong and courageous.
I am spiritually blessed.
Today I seize the day
I am in the right place at the right time.
I am beautiful just the way I am.
I will start today what I put off until tomorrow.
I do not need to change myself to fit some arbitrary mold.
I will let in people who love me for who I am, and not what they want me to be.
My unique perspective is important.
I am a unique individual.
Every day that I am alive is a good day, because I am alive.
No one can dim my light.
The light within me shines through.
I will do the things I think I can not do.
I must love myself, if I wish to know true love from someone else.
I’m better than I used to be. Better than I was yesterday. But hopefully not as good as I’ll be tomorrow.
I root for myself, even if no one else will.
